com.codeski.nbt.tags

Class NBTShort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeski.nbt.tags.NBT
      • com.codeski.nbt.tags.NBTShort

  • public class NBTShort
extends NBT
    A signed integral type that is 2 bytes in length.
